card.description.heroSatia:
*On play:*
{name} summons *Night Maiden*, a Dragon that leaves the battlefield if {name} dies
card.description.heroNightMaiden: If Satia dies, {name} leaves the battlefield
card.description.unitRavenMessenger: Every *3* turns {name} survives on the board, it draws a card
card.description.unitPossessedVulture:
*On attack:*
If {name} kills an enemy creature, it gains *4* power
card.description.unitUnfeelingWarrior:
*On turn start:*
Unfeeling Warrior restores *2* Power for each attack survived last turn
card.description.unitForestScout:
*On attack:*
If {name} did not attack last turn, it deals *5* extra damage
card.description.unitMadBerserker:
*On attack:*
Every consecutive attack on the same target deals *3* more damage
card.description.unitSpinningBarbarian: During Skirmishing phase, {name} can attack up to 3 targets simultaneously
card.description.unitChargingKnight:
{name} can move and attack at the same time
If {name} has moved during his turn, his next attack deals double damage
card.description.unitTwinBowArcher: During Skirmishing phase, instead of attacking the chosen target, {name} attacks units directly to the left and to the right from them
card.description.spellRainOfFire:
{name} deals *8* damage to all enemy units
Then, it draws a card
card.description.spellMagicalStarfall:
{name} increases Power of all allies units by *3* and Attack by *2*
Then, it draws a card
